text: Hi All, Is there any API available to fetch conversations history related to a ticket ?
It would be really great if we could filter here by Account ID or Portal ID — pretty impossible to see what API calls have been made for a specific portal at the moment
I'm trying to create invoices with the private app API but can find any documentation on it #invoices

hi team!
we want to extract all contact’s  email engagements daily.
is this the correct api?
```<https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/email/get_events>```
the limitation in this is that the limit is only 1000
if we were to extract data at email campaign id level on hourly basis; the delivered event export itself will have issue, because majority of emails are delivered in few minutes.
please suggest
